plot: Young Londoner Rob isn't used to being the boss, especially of a Polish stranger twice his own age. Finding virtually nothing in common throughout their working day, patience between the men seems to be running out.
title: Border Work
plot_es: Young Londoner Rob isn't used to being the boss, especially of a Polish stranger twice his own age. Finding virtually nothing in common throughout their working day, patience between the men seems to be running out.
plot_en: Young Londoner Rob isn't used to being the boss, especially of a Polish stranger twice his own age. Finding virtually nothing in common throughout their working day, patience between the men seems to be running out.
